title: Shutter-gai no Sakura Hime
description: Ichijou Shinnosuke, a high school student who likes to draw, has transferred from Toukyou to a high school in the countryside, and is asked by his classmate Sakurada, the daughter of a butcher in the shopping district, to draw a banner for the store. However, Shinnosuke was bullied for drawing at his previous school.

altTitles.ja: シャッター街のさくら姫

altTitles.en: Cherry Blossom Princess Of The Shuttered Street
Cherry Princess of the Abandoned Shopping District
